actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to revise the pay structure of executive positions in the U.S. Postal Service.

summary.text: Prohibits the compensation of any officer or employee of the United States Postal Service, with specified exceptions, at a rate in excess of the maximum rate of basic pay for GS-18 of the General Schedule. Sets maximum compensation for those officers excepted based upon Executive Schedule pay levels. Details guidelines regarding the continuation of those salaries which would otherwise be reduced by the enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to revise the pay structure of executive positions in the U.S. Postal Service.
